DOC.brief_summary: This study multicenter , randomized-control-trial . This study select 1184 Infertile patient associated endometriosis diagnose laparoscopy surgery . Patients go divide two group accord 1:1 ratio randomly assign receive GnRH-a . Cumulative pregnancy rate , end treatment natural pregnancy time , accept assisted reproductive treatment rate , miscarriage rate , live birth rate record .
DOC.brief_title: Reproductive Outcome EM Treated GnRH-a Associated With Laparoscopy
DOC.criteria: Infertile patient Endometriosis III phase：according Revised American Society Reproductive Medicine classification endometriosis : 1996 BMI:1928 kg/㎡ Ovarian reserve function normal（M25：bilateral antral follicles≥6 FSH：512U/ml） Male factor cause infertility hydrosalpinx salpingemphraxis Uterine malformation Uterine cavity lesion Contraindications GnRHa willing participate
